name: arrayNew
description:
Creates an array of 1-3 dimensions. Index array elements
 with square brackets: [ ].
 CFML arrays expand dynamically as data is added.

The param unsynchronized is only available in ACF 2016!

params.name: unsynchronized)
params.description: Users can create unsynchronized arrays by passing a special flag

examples.title: Create the One dimensional array
examples.description: Uses the arrayNew function to create the new array
examples.result: ["All is well", "All is well", "All is well", "All is well"]

examples.title: Create the Two dimensional array
examples.description: Uses the arrayNew function to create the new array

examples.title: Create unsynchronized array
examples.description: Uses the arrayNew function to create the new unsynchronized array
